column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: At 8:20 am on March 8th there was a violent incident on a construction site  in Village 3
column4: Sangkat 4 Sihanoukville.------ A Chinese man was arguing over money with a Chinese woman. When the woman took the money
column5: she was pushed into wet cement.------Police officers arrived and took the Chinese woman into an onsite cabin and found a translator.------After questioning her
column6: the police then said the matter had been resolved without need for more legal action.
